extendedInfo.description: "A shining example of what a free game can be." - PixelFreak - 91/100"From probably the best IAP system in mobile gaming, to some incredibly fun gameplay, this is a title that you seriously need to install into your Android device pronto!" - GameWoof - 4.5/5"It should be a crime that a game this good is free, but there it is..." - AndroidSpin"Quadropus Rampage is a very lively, very fun, and very addicting game that you donât want to miss out on." - Tom Christiansen of Indie Game Mag - 91/100Quadropus Rampage is an Endless Roguelike that casts you, the player, as an enraged, four-legged cephalopod. It is your quest to reach the bottom of the ocean and destroy Pete, the evil god of the sea, before his army of abyssal creatures can overtake the ocean. ***Features*** â¢ Be a quadropus - Go on a rampage â¢ Perfect fusion of roguelike and brawler - Hit enemies in their stupid faces â¢ Endless Gameplay - Randomly generated weapons, levels, and enemies that keep the action fresh until you die from thumb exhaustion â¢ Intuitive, fast-paced combat - Easy to learn, difficult to master. Dodge, block, stab, smash, and spin your way to victory! â¢ Five epic boss fights - Pursue Pete into the depths and bludgeon his mouth off â¢ Mastery system - 23 achievements with gameplay altering rewards â¢ Artifacts - Unearth 39 treasures that let you shoot lasers out of your face or turn your pet starfish into an explosive boomerang â¢ Extensive upgrade tracks - Invest orbs in your quadropus to make him stronger â¢ Hilarious Characters - Break your ribs from intense chuckling â¢ Google Play Game Services (for Android 4.0 and up) - Show your friends who's the neck-slappingest Quadropusâ¢ Xperia Play support - Because WHY NOT? (Buttons only, no joypads yet)â¢ Support for most Android tablets, and all resolutions of devicesFrom the creators of the critically acclaimed Towelfight 2 : The Monocle of Destiny. GET TO TENTACLE-SLAPPIN!

reviews.title: Roguelike Goodness
reviews.comment: This is by far one of the most entertaining games I have ever played on Android. If you enjoy games such as The Binding of Isaac, Super House of Dead Ninjas, and of course, Roguelike, you\'ll love this!
reviews.author: Andrew Moore

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: Great game, good way to spend time while waiting. Great graphics, definitely one of the best games I\'ve played.
reviews.author: David Schwinabart

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It\'s one of the best game I ever played in android. Great graphic, funny, and very entertaining
reviews.author: Muhammad Zulfikar Azhar

reviews.title: Such a great game
reviews.comment: One of the best. Free to play graphics fantastic and just keeps u coming back to finally destroy pete. Thanks for athe truly great game.
reviews.author: adam cohen

reviews.title: The best customer service also the game rocks
reviews.comment: I ran into some difficultues and Sam took care of it. The game is so addictive and straight fun. No real world money needed to play the game.  However,  these brothers deserve support for their excellent product.   Show your support and play a great game, also their other title with the monocle is also great. HARDIK forever
reviews.author: Khalil Raja

reviews.title: Oh so much fun
reviews.comment: This game rocks. The characters are cute, and the controls simple. Whoever the artist is did a super job. I don\'t give 5 stars hardly ever, but this one was worth my time to do so. Thxs guys.
reviews.author: Robyn Jenkins

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: You can play for minutes or hours very easily. The progression is well designed, and can be very challenging. Awesome graphics. I\'m really enjoying the game.
reviews.author: Ooogie Boogie

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: One of the best games I\'ve ever played. Simple, addictive and full of replayability. 5* for sure. Keep up the good work developers! Although the game requires some grinding, it\'s free so I\'m not complainjng
reviews.author: Earnest Luah

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: I love this game.. it has cool story and theme.. a simple yet addictive game :3
reviews.author: Reijavick Lamdha Fandji

reviews.title: Super fun roguelike hack-and-slash
reviews.comment: A must for anyone looking for a straightforward challenge with crisp visuals, fluid gameplay, and tons of replay value. For the price of FREE you can\'t afford to miss out on giving QR a shot.
reviews.author: Tom Christiansen

reviews.title: Awesome, just awesome.
reviews.comment: So I\'ve bought a lot of games but this is the first game I keep coming back to.  Fun and well made plus its from an indie developer.
reviews.author: Ali Abedi

reviews.title: Much fun, but..
reviews.comment: The timed mode is not updated, I mean I have played it several times but it keeps telling me \' You haven\'t tried this mode yet. \' !! My rating was 5 stars before,, please fix.
reviews.author: Nour Daoud

reviews.title: Addicting and funny
reviews.comment: game is easy to pick up and play just about anytime. its humor, slick controls, and well-balanced gameplay make this game sure to please people of all ages.
reviews.author: Josh Fedman

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Easily one of my favorite games. Well done, devs!
reviews.author: Braden Davis

reviews.title: Massively Addictive
reviews.comment: As the summary suggests+its cute. Having said that, the game could do better with some more weight in the graphics department, you know rounding out the edges and stuff
reviews.author: vylestyle2749

reviews.title: Fun and funny ...
reviews.comment: Easy to play, good controls and fun to boot ... Will for sure keep this around, great job
reviews.author: Steve Mccarty

reviews.title: Very entertaining!
reviews.comment: This is the best game I\'ve played on my phone thus far! And I\'ve tried a lot of games, trust me. Five stars all the way.
reviews.author: Hamza Alwarasneh

reviews.title: Great game, butt...
reviews.comment: I\'ts lackng back button support for menus and for exiting the app, and improvements in menu screen transition time. And I thought the game short, because after you kill Pete there\'s nothing more to achieve, you\'ve already unlocked all achievements. Making XPlay\'s Select button go to character menu wolud be welcome too :)
reviews.author: Helio Oliveira Bianchi

reviews.title: Great free game!
reviews.comment: Fun as hell, in app purchases not game breaking, and made by fellow St. Louisans!
reviews.author: Jake Lamprecht

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: But it\'d be awesome if you could customize quadropus with funny (stat boosting?) hats, just a thought
reviews.author: Chris Sheppard
